info.name: Complex Flow Around Unit Disk
info.description: Complex Flow Around Unit Disk By Rik Riesmeijer in 126 characters.

renderpass.code:
void mainImage(out vec4 c, in vec2 z) {         // Flow Around Unit Disk.
    z = 4.0 * z / iResolution.xy - 2.0;         // Center and resize.
    z += vec2(z.x, -z.y) / dot(z, z);           // |f(z)| = |z + 1/z| > 1.
    c = fract(8.0 * vec4(z - 0.1 * iTime, -z)); // Animate the mapping.
}                                               // By Rik Riesmeijer.
                                                // No rights reserved.
renderpass.name: Image
